秧.definition: sapling; seedling; sprout; (esp.) rice seedling; stem; stalk; vine; baby livestock; fry; (dialect) to raise; to cultivate (plants or animals)

秧子.definition: sapling; seedling; sprout; (esp.) rice seedling; stem; stalk; vine; baby livestock; fry; (dialect) (derog.) suffix used to indicate a type of person

秧歌.definition: Yangge, a popular rural folk dance

秧歌劇.definition: Yangge opera, a rural form of theater
